com.empatika.beaconstracker

Interface BeaconManager


  • public interface BeaconManager
    This interface must be implemented by all classes that want to receive beacons notifications.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deadBeacon(Beacon beacon)
      Called with unavailable beacon, that was available earlier.
      void newBeacon(Beacon beacon)
      Called with new available beacon.
      void rangeBeacon(Beacon beacon)
      Called with beacon, that has changed state.
